TopicTitle: [DSE]Space Station Construction Plan(SSCP)Series of KSP Episode 002

Articles.Content:

Hello,everyone!
I'm Danny Carman,one of the kerbal space program players.I am very glad to join the KSP forum.This is my first thread.And welcome to watch my video of KSP playing.

As you can see from the title,DSE-SSCP is included in the series.
Introduce of Episode 2:
01.The second video of DSE-SSCP;
02.The launch is pretty successful;
03.Shape of the space station now is "---",contains two parts;
04.Although the language is Chinese,but I have added the English subtitles of the key points of my words.

With the time going by,I will bring more videos of DSE-SSCP series and other series of KSP playing.
And welcome to give me your suggestions without hesitation if you have.
So I would be very grateful of your watching my videos or following.
